actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide training opportunities for employees of the Office of the Architect of the Capitol, the Botanic Garden, and the Senate Restaurant.

summary.text: Authorizes the training, and the payment of training expenses, of employees of: (1) the Office of the Architect of the Capitol; (2) the United States Botanical Garden; and (3) the Senate restaurant in accordance with specified provisions governing the training of executive branch employees as supplemented by regulations issued by the Architect of the Capitol.

titles.title: A bill to provide training opportunities for employees of the Office of the Architect of the Capitol, the Botanic Garden, and the Senate Restaurant.
